name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.hard-kill-timeout-ms
description: Number of milliseconds to wait before the job client kills the application.

name: dfs.namenode.top.num.users
description: Number of top users returned by the top tool

name: ipc.ping.interval
description:
Timeout on waiting response from server, in milliseconds.
  The client will send ping when the interval is passed without receiving bytes,
  if ipc.client.ping is set to true.

name: dfs.qjournal.prepare-recovery.timeout.ms
description:
Quorum timeout in milliseconds during preparation phase of
    recovery/synchronization for a specific segment.

name: hadoop.caller.context.signature.max.size
description:
The caller's signature (optional) is for offline validation. If the
      signature exceeds the maximum allowed bytes in server, the caller context
      will be abandoned, in which case the caller context will not be recorded
      in audit logs.

name: dfs.webhdfs.ugi.expire.after.access
description:
How long in milliseconds after the last access
      the cached UGI will expire. With 0, never expire.
